author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

Before starting to add any further ROOT dictionary definition policy checks in `edmCheckClassVersion`, I wanted to refactor the code a little bit (just to move all code into functions). I also added a set of tests to ensure the expected behavior when a class is updated. This test revealed a bug the earlier PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/45423 introduced in `edmCheckClassVersion -g` (that impacts `scram b updateclassversion`, IIUC) that prevents the script from running.

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/976

#### PR validation:

Unit tests run.
title: Refactor `edmCheckClassVersion`
